author: pablodecm
body:
This PR includes all the changes done in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19893 so they can be used within 9_4_X. This was asked and discussed in the following issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/21864.

Rebased and locally tested over `CMSSW_9_4_X_2018-01-28-0000`.
title: Backport to 9_4_X of DeepFlavour and TF API
